 2018-02872018-03-12,  CH,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MANDEEP ROSHI CHADHA of Westmount, Quebec, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective April 1, 2018.
